0.text: Innate: Sivir gains  35 − 55 (based on level) bonus movement speed for 2 seconds whenever she damages an enemy  champion with a basic attack or ability. Subsequent attacks and abilities against champions refresh the duration.

Active: Sivir hurls her crossblade in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies within its path, reduced by 0% − 60% (based on non-champions hit). Upon reaching maximum range, the crossblade returns to her, resetting the damage modifier and dealing the same damage to enemies on its way back.

1.text: Each unit can be damaged only once per pass.

0.text: Active: Sivir's next 3 basic attacks within 4 seconds are empowered to bounce to nearby enemies, dealing them physical damage upon arrival. Each unit can only be bounced to once per basic attack.

1.text: Ricochet bounces until there are no valid enemies in range. If the triggering attack  critically strikes, the bounces will do so as well.

2.text: Ricochet  resets Sivir's basic attack timer.

3.text: Ricochet will bounce to targets regardless of having  sight of them or not.

0.text: Active: Sivir gains a  spell shield for 1.5 seconds.

1.text: Sivir restores  mana upon successfully blocking any hostile effect.

0.text: Passive: Sivir gains  bonus attack speed while  Ricochet is active.

1.text: Active: Sivir gains  bonus movement speed for 8 seconds that after a few seconds immediately decays to half effectiveness.

2.text: Sivir also surrounds herself with an aura that rallies all nearby allies, granting them On the Hunt's bonus movement speed buff correspondingly to its remaining duration.

1.concerningText: Active: Sivir hurls her crossblade in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies within its path, reduced by 0% − 60% (based on non-champions hit). 2.concerningText: Active: Sivir's next 3 basic attacks within 4 seconds are empowered to bounce to nearby enemies, dealing them physical damage upon arrival. Each unit can only be bounced to once per basic attack.

4.concerningText: Passive: Sivir gains  bonus attack speed while  Ricochet is active.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Focus: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against minions.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Awe: Grants bonus attack damage equal to 2.5% maximum mana.
Unique – Mana Charge: Grants a charge every 8 seconds, up to 4 charges. Consumes a charge on-hit and whenever affecting an enemy or ally with an ability to grant 3 bonus mana, increased to 6 for champion targets, up to maximum of 360 bonus mana.
Transforms into Muramana at +360 mana.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Nightstalker: Your next basic attack against an enemy champion deals 65 (+ 25% bonus AD) bonus physical damage on-hit and slows the target by 99% for 0.25 seconds (15 second cooldown).
Champion takedowns within 3 seconds reset this effect's cooldown and grant you invisibility for 1.5 seconds.
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 ability haste.
passive.originText:
